content: these mittens were designed and knitted up just in time for j r r tolkien s birthday january 3 the back features the symbol that tolkien created from his initials on the front is a simple recurring ring-like pattern i added a simple sword design on the thumb but this can be swapped out for the ring pattern if that is your preference this is a free pattern so feel free to customize it to suit your needs as long as it is not for commercial for-profit use **gauge** 14 row x 14 stitches = 2 inches in stranded knitting these mittens fit my hands 7 5 inches from top of wrist to tip of middle finger 3 5 inches across knuckles with some room **materials** 3 25 mm double pointed needles or circular needles for magic loop 1 ball of main dk weight yarn ~25 g 1 ball of contrasting dk weight yarn ~25 g waste yarn to hold thumb stitches needle to weave in ends
